title: Leona....sexuality.
body:
so like riot just confirm that leona....is a lesbian <3 and she is crazy for ma redhead gal MF.

"Miss Fortune: *taps mic* Hello, hello! Are we all having a good time?

Draven, Renekton, Zac, Graves, Ziggs, **Leona**, Lee Sin, Dr. Mundo: Yes!!!

Rek'Sai: *shrieks*

Miss Fortune: Excellent. *smiles*

Draven, Renekton, Zac, Graves, Ziggs, **Leona**, Lee Sin, Dr. Mundo: *swoons*

Miss Fortune: It’s rather hot today, isn’t it? A lemonade would be ni—

Draven, Renekton, Zac, Graves, Ziggs, **Leona**, Lee Sin, Dr. Mundo: *holds out drink*"

replies.body:
It could just be for humor.

Plus it's an AU as is most skins.

And it could just be for humor.
Weeeeeeelllllllllllllll, she could be Bi still. Also, even straight women swoon over pretty ladies, xD
indeed. Ive seen my female friends go crazy and start linking girl porn to ME... i was very weirded out to say the least... (wasnt complaining tho.)
This is ur head canon. And always will be.

It's not so much because she's lesbian, it's because she's part of the pool party cast, and it's a big party where everyone is excited and having fun.

Sorry to crush your dreams -- actually, not sorry.
lulu is not on that group or....graves nor taric..
Graves is too busy playing poker with Tobias.

Poker, with TF?

Graves is no fool. He's busy trying to get other people to play poker with Tobias. Where do you think Taric is?

Graves is on the group.
Where the hell are people getting this?
No one's gunna question Rek' sai's sexuality? Rek' sai mains are gunna have a fit, the bias is real /s
Rek'Sai is straight, she gets her pick of male Xer'Sai she finds.

> [{quoted}](name=FeBeast,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E9A2G8H9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-15T00:54:33.880+0000)
>
> No one's gunna question Rek' sai's sexuality? Rek' sai mains are gunna have a fit, the bias is real /s

Rek'sai's sexuality...... it makes me think of a black widow, even though that would be more Elise's cup of tea.
honestly, it does make me more curious about the xer sai and thier social structure.

It's somewhat complex. It is matriarchal, as the Females are larger than males. At the same time though, Rek'Sai is the main producer of babies, as she is the largest and Queen. 

Other females do produce children, and they're allowed to live, but Rek'Sai gets first pick and as such ends up with the most powerful offspring.

They regularly kill each other the same way other animals do in test of superiority, under the idea of survival of the fittest, and best genes reproduce.

Any other questions, and did you really expect me not to answer this?
Its meat. There is only room for meat.
